oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Robots Using ROS: ASuBot
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Jørgensen, Rasmus N.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop husbandry
Weed management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Weeding in organic orchards is a tedious process done either mechanically or by weed burning. Researchers at University of Southern Denmark and Aarhus University created the ASuBot, a self-drive tractor, to handle navigate around trees in organic orchards.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Jørgensen, Rasmus N. (2011) Robots Using ROS: ASuBot. Aarhus University and University of Southern Denmark. Online at <http://www.ros.org/news/2011/10/robots-using-ros-asubot.html <http://www.ros.org/news/2011/10/robots-using-ros-asubot.html>>, accessed on: 27 October 2011.
